function.name: draft_tree_quote_simple
function.description: Generate a structured tree care quote from an analysis of images, videos, and audio. Focus on identifying specific services required.

analysis.description: A detailed, multi-paragraph analysis of the tree(s), site conditions, access, and any potential hazards or special considerations. This should be a comprehensive text block.

species_identification.description: The common name of the primary tree species identified. e.g., 'Douglas Fir', 'Western Red Cedar', 'Unknown'.

height_estimate.description: The estimated height of the tree in feet or meters. e.g., 'approx. 80-90 feet'.

crown_spread.description: The estimated crown spread of the tree in feet or meters. e.g., '40-foot spread'.

dbh_estimate.description: The estimated Diameter at Breast Height (DBH) in inches or cm. e.g., 'around 24 inches'.

climbing_required.description: Is it necessary for an arborist to climb the tree to perform the work? True or false.

rigging_required.description: Will specialized rigging equipment be needed to safely lower limbs or sections of the tree? True or false.

brush_chipping_required.description: Will a wood chipper be needed on-site to process brush? True or false.

wood_removal_required.description: Does the large-diameter wood need to be hauled away from the site? True or false.

firewood_processing.description: Does the client want the wood processed into firewood and left on site? True or false.

brush_hauling_required.description: Do the wood chips or brush need to be hauled away? True or false.

waste_disposal.description: Describe the plan for waste disposal, including estimated volume and type of debris.
